first_translate: they gave me water that was used to mop the floors...
second_translate: they gave me water that was used to rinse a mop...
Are they serious?

first_translate: they’re being so obvious about it.
second_translate: They’re being so blatantly crude and childish about it.

hangle: 그래도 가문을 대표해서 전쟁터에서 5년을 산 사람한테… 정말로?
first_translate: I can’t believe they’re treating someone who fought for their family like this...
second_translate: I can’t believe they’re treating someone who fought on behalf of their family and survived on the battlefield for five years like this...
pfft!
Pfft... Hngh...
She sure laughs a lot.
...But that maid...

hangle: 어디서 본 적이 있는 것 같은데…….
first_translate: I think I’ve seen her before...
second_translate: I think I've seen her somewhere before...

first_translate: I saw her five years ago.
second_translate: I've seen that face before—five years ago.

first_translate: I can see where she gets her attitude from.
second_translate: The more I look, the more her origins show.

hangle: 사생아라고 피오나를 끝없이 괴롭힌 백작부인의 하녀!
first_translate: she’s the countess’ maid who bullied fiona because she was an illegitimate child!
second_translate: She's the countess's maid who relentlessly tormented Fiona for being an illegitimate child!
I should've known...

hangle: 방 하나 좀 제대로 줬다고 좀 방심하다니…
first_translate: I let my guard down because they gave me a nice room...
second_translate: I let my guard down a little just because they gave me a decent room...

hangle: 이런 행동이 여전히 묵인되어 이루어진다는 건,
first_translate: the fact that they’re still allowing this to happen...
second_translate: The fact that this kind of behavior is still being tolerated...

hangle: 이 가문이 여전히 날 쓸모도 가치도 없는 사생아로 보고 있다는 뜻.
first_translate: ...means that they still see me as a useless illegitimate child.
second_translate: ...means that this family still sees me as a worthless and insignificant illegitimate child.

first_translate: it seems like the people in this house...
second_translate: It seems like the people in this household...
They still seem to be under an illusion.

first_translate: they still think I’m a 13-year-old illegitimate child...
second_translate: They still think I have no money and that I’m just a 13-year-old illegitimate child...
...with no money, nowhere to go,

hangle: 아무런 힘도 없는 반쪽짜리 핏줄만 가진 열 세 살 사생아로 여기고 있어.
first_translate: no place to go, and no power.
second_translate: a powerless thirteen-year-old illegitimate child with no place to go.

hangle: 이런 식으로 환대해 주니 복수심이 다시 타오를 것 같네.
first_translate: the way they’re treating me is making me want to get revenge.
second_translate: The way they're treating me is reigniting my desire for revenge.

hangle: 나야 그렇다치고 내내 고통 받았을 ‘피오나’를 생각하면 더……
first_translate: thinking about how fiona must have suffered...
second_translate: Thinking about how Fiona must have suffered all this time makes it even worse...

hangle: 이대로 두는 건 아닌 것 같아.
first_translate: I can’t just let this go.
second_translate: I can't just let this slide.
You there.
What's your name again?
It's May.
Alright, May.
I've seen this face before.
Come to think of it,

hangle: 이 하녀는 나와 똑바로 눈을 마주친다.
first_translate: this maid is looking me straight in the eye.
second_translate: This maid is looking me straight in the eyes.

hangle: 일반적인 귀족 집안이라면 쉬이 허용될 리 없는 일이야.
first_translate: this isn’t something that would be allowed in a normal noble family.
second_translate: This isn't something that would normally be allowed in a noble household.
She's acting so carelessly...

hangle: 백작 부인의 총애를 믿고, 그녀의 의사를 대변하고 있기 때문이겠지.
first_translate: ...because she trusts that the countess will protect her.
second_translate: ...because she trusts in the countess's favor and acts as her mouthpiece.

hangle: 백작 부인은 원래도 나를 혐오스럽게 여겼으니…
first_translate: the countess has always hated me,
second_translate: The countess has always found me repulsive...

hangle: 상속 문제가 있는 지금은 더더욱 내가 눈엣가시로 보일 거다.
first_translate: so I’m sure she sees me as a thorn in her side now that there’s an inheritance issue.
second_translate: Now that there's an inheritance issue, I'm sure she sees me as even more of a thorn in her side.

hangle: 천한 사생아에게 보석 한 알이라도 빼앗길까,
first_translate: I’m sure she’s worried that I’ll take even a single jewel from her.
second_translate: She and the entire Green family must be fretting over the possibility of a lowly bastard like me taking even a single jewel.

hangle: 그녀뿐 아니라 그린 가문 전체가 그걸로 전전긍긍하고 있을 테지.
first_translate: the entire green family is probably worried about that.
second_translate: Not just her, but the entire Green family is probably in a state of anxiety over the thought of losing even a single gem to a lowly illegitimate child.
Why is her reaction so dull?

hangle: 이 멍청한 사생아가 설마 본인이 모욕당한 줄도 모르는 건가?
first_translate: does this stupid girl not know that she’s been insulted?
second_translate: Could this stupid illegitimate child really not realize that she’s been insulted?
I’ll make sure she understands, whether she wants to or not.

hangle: 백작 부인은 눈물을 쏙 빼서 쫓아내기를 원하신다.
first_translate: the countess wants to kick her out in tears.
second_translate: The countess wants to drive her out in tears.
Fiona Green,

hangle: 고작해야 이제 갓 성인이 된 여자애.
first_translate: she’s just a girl who’s just become an adult.
second_translate: She's merely a girl who has just come of age.

hangle: 운 좋게 살아 돌아와선 가문에 빌붙을 생각인가본데,
first_translate: she’s lucky to be alive, but she’s trying to leech off the family.
second_translate: She’s lucky to have survived, and now she’s trying to leech off the family.

first_translate: there’s no way that’s going to happen!
second_translate: Not a chance!

hangle: 천한 사생아 따위… 넌 나에 대한 마님의 신임을 두텁게 해줄 기회에 불과해.
first_translate: you’re just an illegitimate child... you’re just an opportunity for me to gain the countess’ trust.
second_translate: You're just a lowly illegitimate child... nothing more than a chance for me to strengthen my lady's trust in me.

hangle: 이 가문에 네 자리따윈 없다는 걸 똑똑히 알려주지!
first_translate: I’ll make sure you know that you have no place in this family!
second_translate: I'll make sure you understand that you have no place in this family!
May.

first_translate: I know what you’re trying to do.
second_translate: I understand your intentions clearly.
What are you talking about?
Hmph.

hangle: 고작 이 정도로 울기라도 하려는 건가?
second_translate: Is she really about to cry over something this trivial?

hangle: 자기가 진짜 귀족이라고 착각하고 있던 거 아니…
first_translate: did she think she was a real noble--
second_translate: Did she actually think she was a real noble--
…Huh?
Did that just happen...?
...hit me?!

hangle: 내내 기죽어서 저택 바닥을 기어 다니던 그 피오나 따위가?!
first_translate: fiona, who used to crawl around the house like a bug?!
second_translate: Fiona, who was always cowering and crawling around the mansion floor?!
Like I said yesterday,

hangle: 난 이 집안이 변하지 않은 것 같아서 기뻐.
first_translate: I’m glad that this house hasn’t changed.
second_translate: I'm glad this family hasn't changed.
what is the meaning of this?!
May.

first_translate: do you know what you did wrong?
second_translate: Do you know what you did wrong?
It's strange, it's clearly an illegitimate child...
She’s even smiling.
But why...

hangle: 이렇게 숨 막히는 공포가 느껴지는 걸까?!
second_translate: Why do I feel this suffocating fear?!

hangle: 이러면 곤란해지는 건 피오나 아가씨 일걸요?
first_translate: you’re going to get in trouble, miss fiona!
second_translate: It'll be miss Fiona who gets in trouble for this.

first_translate: I’m going to tell the countess!
second_translate: I'll report this to the countess immediately!

first_translate: she won’t let you get away with this--
second_translate: If the Countess finds out about this, she won't let you off the hook.

first_translate: she won’t let you get away with this--
second_translate: She absolutely won't stand for this--
Aah!

first_translate: I asked you what you did wrong.
second_translate: I asked what you did wrong.

first_translate: what did you bring me, mae?
second_translate: What did you bring, Allen?
Th-That’s...
It's... Miss Fiona's...
Aaah!
Ah...
W-What on earth is this?!
What are you doing, May?
Why aren't you answering me?
What did you do wrong?

first_translate: if you’re not going to answer me,
second_translate: If you have no intention of answering properly,

hangle: 내가 지내온 헤일론의 방식으로 대화를 나눠볼까.
first_translate: should I talk to you the way I did in the army?
second_translate: Should I talk to you the way I did in Heilron?

hangle: 헤일론에선 함부로 주인에게 입을 놀리는 사용인의 혀를 자르고는 해.
first_translate: in the army, we cut off the tongues of servants who spoke out of turn.
second_translate: In Hailon, we cut off the tongues of servants who spoke out of turn.

first_translate: what kind of punishment do they give in the capital?
second_translate: What kind of punishment do they enforce in the capital?
Ah...
Oh my.

hangle: 말이 없으니 어쩔 수 없이 헤일론의 방식대로 혀를 자를까?
first_translate: should I cut off your tongue the way we did in the army?
second_translate: Should I cut off your tongue the way it's done in Heilron?
I-I'm sor...
ack!
Mae.
Who am I?

hangle: 그, 그린 백작가의 피오나 아가씨 이십니다…….
first_translate: y-you’re miss fiona of house green...
second_translate: Y-you're Miss Fiona of the Green Count's family...
Then, what should you do?

hangle: 두, 두 번 다시 주제넘은 짓은 하지 않겠습니다.
first_translate: I-I’ll never do anything like this again.
second_translate: I-I’ll never overstep my bounds again.
Please... forgive me...

first_translate: yes, that’s what you should do.
second_translate: Yes, that's what you should do.

hangle: 당장 가서 이 사실을 마님께 보고하자.
first_translate: I’ll go tell the countess right away.
second_translate: I'll go report this to the countess immediately.
Then...

first_translate: ...I’m sure she’ll take care of this!
second_translate: I’m sure she’ll make sure to handle this firmly!
Where are you going?
This needs to be taken care of.
Keep this in mind.

first_translate: if you try to do something like this again,
second_translate: If you pull another boring stunt like this...

hangle: 그땐 정말 대가를 치러야 할 거야.
first_translate: you’ll have to pay for it.
